Name: Ichth.ys
About the game: Cascadiana, a technologically advanced surveillance state. People disappear regularly and the internet is highly censored. But there remains one free place online and the few who know of it call it Ichth.ys. Fraser Watson was just an amateur hacker when he became involved with the creators of Ichth.ys, but he will soon find himself wrapped up in a dangerous world of secrecy, technology, and betrayal! Enter a world of deception, paranoia, love, and board game cafes in Ichth.ys! A thrilling story Multiple endings Over 17,000 words of dialogue Turn-based RPG combat In-game forum updates as you play Explore themes of censorship, activism, and morality Featuring LGBT characters
